title: Top Secrets for a Successful Marriage | Relationship Theory
description: In celebration of their 16 year wedding anniversary, Tom and Lisa share their top tips for creating a lasting marriage.   If you have a question you’d like us to answer on the podcast, you can email us at connect@impacttheory.com   Check out our awesome sponsors! Four Sigmatic: Visit foursigmatic.com/impacttheory and use discount code: "IMPACT" for %15 off your order!   Blinkist: Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days!
